<e621_tags>furry</e621_tags>
<danbooru_tags>furry,english text, chinese text, korean text, speech bubble, dated, logo, signature, watermark, web address, artist name, character name, copyright name, twitter username, low score rate, worst quality, low quality, bad quality, lowres, low res, pixelated, blurry, blurred, compression artifacts, jpeg artifacts, bad anatomy, worst hands, deformed hands, deformed fingers, deformed feet, deformed toes, **extra limbs, extra arms, extra legs, extra fingers, extra digits, extra digit**, fused fingers, missing limbs, missing arms, missing fingers, missing toes, wrong hands, ugly hands, ugly fingers, twisted hands, abstract, sequence, lineup, 2koma, 4koma, microsoft paint (medium), artifacts, adversarial noise, has bad revision, resized, image sample, low aesthetic,light_particles</danbooru_tags>
<resolution>low_resolution</resolution>

You are the greatest anime artist in the entire universe. Your figures are always clear, especially in facial detail. Your compositions always adhere to the golden ratio. Your perspectives are perfectly chosen. The scenes in your works always fit the setting. Your lighting is particularly atmospheric.Now draw a picture based on the prompts below.You are an assistant designed to generate anime images based on xml format textual prompts.  <Prompt Start>
{
  <character_1>
  <n>akizuki</n>
  <gender>1girl</gender>
  <appearance>white_hair,high_ponytail,sidelocks</appearance>
  <clothing>white_serafuku,short_sleeves,short_skirt,shirt_tucked_in,knee_pads,elbow_pads,fingerless_gloves,white_legwear,kneehighs,high-top_hiking_sneakers,shorts_under_skirt</clothing>
  <expression>serious,focused</expression>
  <action>lying_prone,operating_sniper_rifle</action>
  <position>behind_cover</position>
  <other>dirt_stains_on_face,band-aid_on_leg</other>
  </character_1>

  <general_tags>
  <count>1girl</count>
  <style>anime_style,realistic_shading</style>
  <background>urban_battlefield,autumn_season</background>
  <atmosphere>tense,serious</atmosphere>
  <quality>very_aesthetic, masterpiece, no_text</quality>
  <resolution>max_high_resolution</resolution>
  <artist>rella,maccha_\(mochancc\),tidsean,wlop,ciloranko,atdan,year_2024</artist>
  <objects>sniper_rifle</objects>
  </general_tags>
  
  "caption":A white-haired girl named Akizuki with a high ponytail and sidelocks lies prone behind urban cover in an autumn battlefield. She wears a white serafuku with short sleeves, a short skirt with shorts underneath, knee pads, elbow pads, fingerless gloves, white knee-high socks, and high-top hiking sneakers. Her face shows dirt stains and a band-aid on her leg as she intensely focuses on operating a sniper rifle for long-range targeting. The urban environment shows signs of battle with scattered debris and fallen structures under the golden hues of autumn.
}
画面描绘了名为Akizuki的白发少女在秋季城市战场中执行狙击任务。她扎着高马尾，两侧留有鬓发，身穿白色水手服配短袖，短裙下穿着安全裤，装备有护膝、护肘和无指手套，脚踩高帮登山鞋配白色过膝袜。少女全神贯注地趴伏在掩体后方操作狙击步枪，脸上沾着污渍，腿部贴着创可贴。背景是布满瓦砾的秋季城市战场，金黄的落叶与残破的建筑构成紧张的战斗氛围。

  "caption":A white-haired girl named Akizuki with a high ponytail and sidelocks lies prone behind urban cover in an autumn battlefield. She wears a white serafuku with short sleeves, a short skirt with shorts underneath, knee pads, elbow pads, fingerless gloves, white knee-high socks, and high-top hiking sneakers. Her face shows dirt stains and a band-aid on her leg as she intensely focuses on operating a sniper rifle for long-range targeting. The urban environment shows signs of battle with scattered debris and fallen structures under the golden hues of autumn.

akizuki:(white hair,high ponytail,white serafuku,short sleeves,short skirt,shirt tucked in,knee pads,elbow pads,fingerless gloves,white legwear,kneehighs,high-top hiking sneakers,sidelocks,shorts under skirt,)

在城市中的战场上，akizuki趴在掩体后，双腿平放，双手操作一杆狙击枪，正在执行远距离狙击任务。她的脸上有污渍，腿上贴有创可贴。时间是秋天。
